products.title: Crushed Velvet Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: The crushed velvet pearl roman blind is soft, stylish and elegant. Its light, neutral colourway has a beautiful texture and is so soft to touch. A shade or two warmer than white, you can match this blind with just about any interior design scheme to add a drop of lavish luxury the crushed velvet pearl roman blind is soft, stylish and elegant.
